text: Any person violating § 6-731.01 shall be imprisoned for not more than 10 days, fined not more than $300, or both.

title.text: Housing and Building Restrictions and Regulations. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Alterations to Rental Units Causing Violations of Housing Regulations After Notice to Vacate.
